Title: Arbitrary Code Injection
Description: mobile-icon-resizer has a code execution vulnerability via the image resizing configuration: the parameters `ratio` and `baseRatio` are passed directly to `eval()`, thus allowing dynamic javascript payloads to be executed.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 0.2.0 up to 0.4.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.2.0, all versions after 0.4.2
